name: Tales from Servinia: Trust
description: Tales from Servinia : Trust is a project that I've pretty much made my hobby. It's my first time ever using RPGmaker or making a game in general so please don't roast me alive. Tales from Servinia : Trust is a fantasy RPG with a few scifi elements (But admittedly not many.) Save the country from a mysterious organization that seems bound and determined to kidnap every last man woman and child. Witches, Robots, magic, and a decent sized world to explore.
